DOC.criteria: Woman age 65 To hypovitaminosis D ( i.e . serum 25hydroxyvitamin D [ 25OHD ] concentration ≤ 30ng/mL ) To hypercalcemia ( define serum calcium concentration ≥ 2,65mmol/L ) Ability walk distance 15 meter unaided Ability eat 2 yogurt per day Memory complaint without cognitive decline To give sign informed consent participate trial To affiliate French Social Security To vitamin D supplementation inclusion Existence dementia accord DSMIV NINCDSADRDA criterion others cognitive disorder : untreated thyroid dysfunction , chronic ongoing ethylism , history syphilis , stroke sequela , depressive symptomatology ( Geriatric Depression Scale > 5/15 ) Osteoarticular disease low member / spine alter biomechanical characteristic body .
